T02TD2887E:234b-1: badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02TD2887E:234b-3: phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2887E:234b-4: lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2887E:234b-5: gnyis med ye shes bcu drug lon //
T02TD2887E:234b-6: ye shes mnga' bdag gzhan snang mdzad //
T02TD2887E:234b-7: lcang lor gsang ba btul nas bzhugs //
T02TD2887E:234b-8: dpal ldan de la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2887E:234b-9: 'gro ba bsgral par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2887E:234b-10: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsam mo //
T02TD2887E:234b-11: de la dang por dbang thob pa'i //
T02TD2887E:234b-12: dam gnas rigs ldan rnal 'byor des //
T02TD2887E:234b-13: nyams dga'i gnas su bsam gtan bya //
T02TD2887E:234b-14: khrus byas bde ba'i stan 'dug nas //
T02TD2887E:234b-15: sems can don phyir dran bya'o //
T02TD2887E:234b-16: rang nyid zla steng h'um las ni //
T02TD2887E:235a-2: nam mkhar dmigs la phyag 'tshal mchod //
T02TD2887E:235a-3: sdig pa bshags sogs bdun pa bsam //
T02TD2887E:235a-4: de nas byams sogs bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2887E:235a-5: brtan g-yo srid gsum stong par bsam //
T02TD2887E:235a-6: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a t'a konya\ham /
T02TD2887E:235a-7: de nas hr'i: dang aam yig las //
T02TD2887E:235a-9: de steng h'um bsam de las 'od //
T02TD2887E:235a-13: de las skur gyur sprin dkar mdog / rdo rje gtum po 'jigs pa che //
T02TD2887E:235a-14: g-yas pa rdo rje thugs kar gsor //
T02TD2887E:235a-15: g-yon pas khu tshur dku ru brten //
T02TD2887E:235a-16: mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar bas mdzes //
T02TD2887E:235a-17: phyag rgya lnga sogs rgyan ldan zhing //
T02TD2887E:235a-18: ye shes sku la dri mas stong //
T02TD2887E:235a-19: gnas gsum aom sogs byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2887E:235a-20: de nas thugs ka'i h'um las ni //
T02TD2887E:235a-21: 'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' dgug / mchod bstod byas la dgug gzhug bya //
T02TD2887E:235a-23: phyogs bcu rgyal pa'i thugs kar phog / phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD2887E:235a-24: bum chu thogs pa'i lha mo yis //
T02TD2887E:235a-25: dbang bskur dag byas rigs bdag po //
T02TD2887E:235a-26: mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin //
T02TD2887E:235a-27: de nas h'um las lha mo sprul //
T02TD2887E:235a-28: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02TD2887E:235a-29: yon chab me tog bdug spos snang //
T02TD2887E:235a-30: dri dang lha bshos sgra yis mchod //
T02TD2887E:235a-31: bstod la thugs kar nyi gdan la //
T02TD2887E:235a-32: h'um bsams sngags kyi 'od zer tshul //
T02TD2887E:235a-33: bskor ba'i tshul gyis bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2887E:235a-34: aom badzra tsanda sarba dusht'anta ka ha na da ha pa tsa h'um phat /
T02TD2887E:235a-36: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab bkug nas //
T02TD2887E:235a-37: gtor ma bdud rtsir bsams la bsngo //
T02TD2887E:235a-38: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2887E:235a-39: a'adya nud panna t'at aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2887E:235a-40: tshim par byas la gnas su gtang //
T02TD2887E:235a-41: aom a'a:h'um mu: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dbye //
T02TD2887E:235a-42: mchod bstod bzod gsol smon lam gdab //
T02TD2887E:235a-43: gshegs pa'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2887E:235a-44: dam tshig sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2887E:235a-45: spyod lam kun du gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2887E:235a-46: gzungs sngags phan yon ji ltar gsungs pa kun //
T02TD2887E:235a-47: 'di la mi gnas de dag 'byung ba min //
T02TD2887E:235b-0: bdag gis bsgrub @235b pa'i nus pa de med kyang //
T02TD2887E:235b-1: snying rje'i dbang gis 'gro la phan gdags phyir /
T02TD2887E:235b-2: sgrub thabs rin chen 'dus pa 'di bshad pas //
T02TD2887E:235b-3: sku gsum yid bzhin rin chen thob par shog / phyag na rdo rje gos dkar po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD2887E:235b-4: slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2887E:235b-7: // / lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur pa'o//
